text: The 2008 Nickelodeon Indonesia Kids' Choice Awards were held on November 29, 2008, at the Balai Sarbini in Setiabudi South Jakarta and hosted by Tora Sudiro, Tasya Kamila, and Ringgo Agus Rahman. List the nominations of 2008 Nickelodeon Indonesia Kids' Choice Awards retrieved on 2008-11-24 The ceremony awards held the theme for "Candylane". Agnes Monica, Afgan, Cinta Laura, and Raffi Ahmad led the nominations with two categories. Agnes Monica was the biggest winner of the night, taking home two awards in the categories: Favorite Female Singer and Indonesian Star Wannabe Award. ==Winners and nominees== Winners are listed on bold. {| class=wikitable style="width="100%" |- !Favorite Male Singer !Favorite Female Singer |- | valign= "top" | * Afgan ** Delon ** Glenn Fredly ** Ari Lasso | valign= "top" | * Agnes Monica ** Gita Gutawa ** Cinta Laura ** Bunga Citra Lestari |- !Favorite Actor !Favorite Actress |- | valign= "top" | * Dude Herlino ** Tora Sudiro ** Teuku Wisnu ** Raffi Ahmad | valign= "top" | * Cinta Laura ** Marshanda ** Shireen Sungkar ** Luna Maya |- !Favorite Cartoon !Favorite Band |- | valign= "top" | * SpongeBob SquarePants ** Doraemon ** Naruto ** Avatar: The Last Airbender | valign= "top" | * The Changcuters ** Ungu ** Project Pop ** D'Masiv |- !Favorite Athlete !Favorite Presenter |- | valign= "top" | * Chris John ** Taufik Hidayat ** Maria Kristin ** Bambang Pamungkas | valign= "top" | * Daniel Mananta ** Ruben Onsu ** Indra Bekti ** Eko Patrio |- !Indonesian Star Wannabe Award !Slime Star |- | valign= "top" | * Agnes Monica ** Cinta Laura ** Afgan ** Raffi Ahmad | valign= "top" | * Giring Nidji ** Luna Maya |- |} ==References== Category:2008 film awards Category:2008 television awards Category:2008 music awards Category:2008 in Indonesian television
title: 2008 Nickelodeon Indonesia Kids' Choice Awards
